S06adhsatpu:1_0: namo namaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvebhyaḥ // namo bhagavatyā āryaprajñāpāramitāyai //
S06adhsatpu:2_0_0: AśP 1. evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān sarvatathāgatavajrādhiṣṭhānasamayajñānavividhaviśeṣasamanvāgataḥ sarvatathāgataratnamukuṭatraidhātukābhiṣekaprāptaḥ
S06adhsatpu:4_0: AśP 3. evaṃ pramukhābhir aṣṭābhir bodhisattvakoṭībhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S06adhsatpu:4_1: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanam kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ sarvadharmaviśuddhimukhaṃ brahmacaryam saṃprakāśayati sma /
S06adhsatpu:5_2: tadyathā (1) surataviśuddhipadam etad yat uta bodhisattvapadam /
S06adhsatpu:5_22: tat kasya hetoḥ / tathā hi sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaviśuddhāḥ sarvadharmāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāviśuddhiteti /
S06adhsatpu:6_0_0: AśP 5. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvaviśuddhipadanirhāranāmadheyaṃ prajñāpāramitānayaṃ sakṛd api śroṣyati
S06adhsatpu:6_0_1: tasyā bodhimaṇḍāt sarvajñeyāvaraṇakleśāvaraṇakarmāvaraṇāni mahānty apy upacinvato na kadācid api narakādyapāyopapattir bhaviṣyati /
S06adhsatpu:6_1: pāpāni ca kṛtamātrāṇy aduḥkhataḥ kṣayaṃ yāsyanti /
S06adhsatpu:6_2: yaś ca dhārayiṣyati dine dine vācayiṣyati svādhyāyiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati sa ihaiva janmani sarvadharmasamatāvajrasamādhipratilambhāt sarvadharmeśvaro bhaviśyati /
S06adhsatpu:6_4: ṣoḍaśame mahābodhisattvajanmani tathāgatatvaṃ pratilapsyate vajradharatvaṃ ceti /
S06adhsatpu:7_0_0: AśP 6. atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatamahāyānābhisamayaḥ sarvamaṇḍalaḥ sakalavajradhātvagryasattvaḥ sakalatraidhātukasarvatrilokavijayy
S06adhsatpu:7_0_2: eva prajñāpāramitānayārtham udyotayan prahasitavadanas tad ādyaṃ mahāvajram vāmagarvollālanatayā svahṛdyutkarṣaṇayogena dhārayann
S06adhsatpu:8_0: AśP 7. atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgataḥ punar apīmaṃ prajñāpāramitānayaṃ sarvatathāgatavajradharmatābhisaṃbodhinirhāraṃ nāma deśayati sma /
S06adhsatpu:9_0: AśP 8. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imāṃś caturo dharmavihārāñ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati sa sarvapāpasamācāro 'pi sarvāpāyasamatikrānto bhaviṣyaty ā bodhimaṇḍāt* /
S06adhsatpu:10_0: AśP 9. athedam uktvā bhagavāñ jñānamuṣṭiparigraha idam evārthapadaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayan smitamukha idaṃ sarvadharmasamatāhṛdayam abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:11_0: AśP 10. atha bhagavān sarvaduṣṭavinayanaśākyamunis tathāgataḥ punar api sarvadharmasamatāvijayasaṅgrahaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānirhāram abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:12_0_0: AśP 11. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ prajñāpāramitānayaṃ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati tasya traidhātukopapannān
S06adhsatpu:12_0_1: api sarvasattvān prapātayato nāpāyagamanaṃ bhaviṣyati vinayavaśam upādāya /
S06adhsatpu:13_0_0: AśP 12. atha vajrapāṇir imam eva dharmatārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayaṃs trilokavijayavajrāṃ nāma mudrāṃ baddhvā sabhrukuṭibhrūbhaṅgadīptadṛṣṭivihasitaruṣiteṣaddaṃṣṭrākarālavadanakamalaḥ
S06adhsatpu:13_0_1: pratyālīḍhasthānastha idaṃ vajrahūṃkāraṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:14_0: AśP 13. atha bhagavān svabhāvaviśuddhadharmatāprāptas tathāgataḥ punar apīmaṃ sarvadharmasamatāvalokiteśvarajñānamudraṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayārtham abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:15_0: AśP 14. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ nayaṃ śroṣyati dhārayisyati vācayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati sa sarvarāgamadhyasthito 'pi padmam iva rāgadoṣair na malair āgantukair lepaṃ yāsyati /
S06adhsatpu:16_0_0: AśP 15. atha bhagavān avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imam evārthapadaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayan prahasitavadanaḥ padmapattravikāsanatayā
S06adhsatpu:16_0_1: rāgādinirlepatām avalokayann idaṃ sarvajagadviśvarūpapadmaṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:17_0: AśP 16. atha bhagavān sarvatraidhātukādhipatis tathāgataḥ punar api sarvatathāgatābhiṣekasambhavajñānagarbhaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayārtham abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:18_0_0: AśP 17. athākāśagarbho bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prahasitavadano bhūtvā svaśirasi vajraratnābhiṣekamālām avabandhayann imam
S06adhsatpu:18_0_1: eva dharmatārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayann idaṃ sarvābhiṣekasamayaratnaṃ nāma hṛdayam abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:19_0_0: AśP 18. atha bhagavān sarvatathāgatajñānamudrāprāptaḥ sarvatathāgatamuṣṭidharaḥ sarvatathāgataḥ śāśvataḥ punar apīmaṃ sarvatathāgatajñānamudrādhiṣṭhānavajraṃ
S06adhsatpu:20_0_0: AśP 19. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imam dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyaty uddeksyati bhāvayiṣyati sa sarvasiddhīḥ
S06adhsatpu:21_0_0: AśP 20. atha bhagavān vajramuṣṭir mahāsamayavajramudrāparigraha imam evārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayoddīpayan prahasitavadana idaṃ
S06adhsatpu:22_0: AśP 21. atha bhagavān sarvadharmasamatāprapañcas tathāgataḥ punar apīmaṃ cakrākṣaraparivartaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitānayārtham abhāṣata /
S06adhsatpu:24_0: AśP 32. ...t* tatra mahāvajreśvara idaṃ tattvahṛdayam agāt* / oṃ vajranetrībhyaḥ svāhā //
S06adhsatpu:25_0_0: AśP 33. atha bhagavān anantāparyantaniṣṭhas tathāgato 'paryantāniṣṭhadharmā punar apy asya kalpasya pariniṣṭhādhiṣṭhānārtham
S06adhsatpu:26_0: AśP 33*. vajra oṃ sarvadharmatāprapañco hili sarvadharmatā mili sarvānurāgiṇi svāhā //
S06adhsatpu:27_0_0: AśP 34. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śroṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyaty uddekṣyati pravartayiṣyati bhāvayiṣyati
S06adhsatpu:27_0_1: tasyāniṣṭhāṃ buddhabodhisattvacaryāṃ gatvā sarvāvaraṇapariniṣṭhatayā tathāgatatvaṃ vajradharatvaṃ vāśu bhaviṣyati /
S06adhsatpu:28_1: oṃ bhagavann ārāt pāraṃ viśodhaya svāhā /
S06adhsatpu:29_0: AśP 35. atha sarvatathāgatāḥ samājam āgamyāsya dharmaparyāyasyāmogham apratihatāśusiddhyarthaṃ vajrapāṇaye sādhukāram adāt*
S06adhsatpu:30_0: sādhu sādhu mahāsattva sādhu sādhu mahāsukha /
S06adhsatpu:30_1: sādhu sādhu mahāyāna sādhu sādhu mahāmate // 1//
S06adhsatpu:30_5: adhṛṣṭāś cāghatavyāś ca sarvamārādibhis tu te // 3 //
S06adhsatpu:31_1: idam uktvā tu sarvāgrāḥ sarvabuddhāḥ sasauraghanāḥ /
S06adhsatpu:32_0_0: AśP 37. atha bhagavān vairocanas tathāgataḥ sarvatathāgataguhyadharmatāprāptaḥ sarvadharmāprapañcaḥ punar apīdaṃ mahāsukhavajrāmoghasamayaṃ
S06adhsatpu:35_1: tāvat sattvārtham atulaṃ śaktāḥ kartum anirvṛtāḥ // 6 // prajñāpāramitopāyajñānādhiṣṭhānavāsitāḥ /
S06adhsatpu:35_3: rāgādivinayo loka ā bhavāt pāpakṛt sadā /
S06adhsatpu:35_4: teṣāṃ viśodhanārthaṃ tu vinayanty ā bhavāt svayam // 8 //
S06adhsatpu:35_5: yathā padmaṃ suraktaṃ tu rāgadoṣair na lipyate /
S06adhsatpu:35_6: vāsadoṣair bhave nityaṃ na lipyante jagaddhitāḥ // 9 //
S06adhsatpu:36_0_0: AśP 39. yaḥ kaścid vajrapāṇe imaṃ paramādyam prajñāpāramitānayamukhaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dine dine kālyam utthāyoccārayiṣyati
S06adhsatpu:36_0_1: śroṣyati vā sa sarvasukhasaumanasyalābhī mahāsukhavajrāmoghasamayasiddhim ātyantikīm ihaiva janmani lapsyate /
S06adhsatpu:37_0: AśP 40. atha bhagavān vajrapāṇiṃ guhyakādhipatim āmantrayate sma /
S06adhsatpu:37_2_0: oṃ bodhicittavajre // 1 // oṃ samantabhadracarye // 2 // oṃ cintāmaṇi // 3 // oṃ anirodhe // 4 // oṃ jātivivartani // 5 //
S06adhsatpu:37_2_1: oṃ sarvavijñāne // 6 // oṃ mahāvirāgadharmate // 7 // oṃ vīryakavace // 8 // oṃ sarvagāmini // 9 // oṃ vajrakavacadṛḍhacitte //
S06adhsatpu:37_2_2: 10 // oṃ sarvatathāgate // 11 // oṃ svabhāvaviśuddhe // 12 // oṃ dharmatājñānaviśuddhe // 13 // oṃ karmaviśodhani hūṃ //
S06adhsatpu:37_2_3: 14 // oṃ nisumbhavajriṇi phaṭ* // 15 // oṃ kāmarāge // 16 // oṃ jaha vajre // 17 // oṃ hūṃ sarvadāyini // 18 // oṃ hrīḥ //
S06adhsatpu:37_2_4: 19 // oṃ akāramukhe // 20 // oṃ prajñāpāramite // 21 // oṃ aṃ vaṃ hūṃ oṃ aḥ // 22 // oṃ sarvatathāgatakāyāgre // 23 // oṃ
S06adhsatpu:38_0: AśP 42. nāyaṃ vajrapāṇe 'navaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ karṇapuṭe nipatiṣyati /
S06adhsatpu:38_1: nāpy anavaropitakuśalamūlaiḥ sattvaiḥ śakyo likhituṃ paṭhituṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ satkartuṃ gurukartuṃ mānayituṃ pūjayitum* /
S06adhsatpu:38_2: anyatra bahubuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlās te sattvā bhaviṣyanti ya imaṃ prajñāpāramitānayamukham dharmaparyāyam antaśa ekākṣaram api śroṣyanti /
S06adhsatpu:38_4_0: yena kenacid vajrapāṇe 'śītigaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi na satkṛtāni na gurukṛtāni na mānitāni na
S06adhsatpu:38_4_1: pūjitāni bhavanti tena na śakyo 'ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānayamukho dharmaparyāyaḥ śrotum* /
S06adhsatpu:38_5: tasmāc caityabhūtaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati yatrāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ pracariṣyati /
S06adhsatpu:38_6: vandanīyaś ca sa pudgalo bahukalpakoṭī bhaviṣyati yasyāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ kāyagato vā pustakagato vā bhaviṣyati /
S06adhsatpu:38_8: na cāsya māraḥ pāpīyān antarāyaṃ kariṣyati /
S06adhsatpu:38_9: catvāraś cāsya mahārājānaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā bhaviṣyanti rakṣāvaraṇaguptaye anyāś ca devatāḥ /
S06adhsatpu:38_12: samāsato yatra buddhakṣetre ākāṅkṣiṣyate tatra tatropapatsyate /
S06adhsatpu:38_14: api ca pradeśamātraṃ mayā kīrtitam iti /
S06adhsatpu:39_0: AśP 43. idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanaso vajrapāṇipramukhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* /
